description: Exception list for known false positives in Stripe event checking
notes: These events may appear as 'extra' in StripeEventMap due to naming convention differences between SDK types and actual event names

exceptions.reason: SDK naming convention may differ from actual event name
SDK naming convention may differ from actual event name
Naming pattern mismatch in SDK type conversion
Naming pattern mismatch in SDK type conversion
SDK type naming differs from actual Stripe event naming
SDK type naming differs from actual Stripe event naming
